db:abstract.db:para: Provides C++ classes for writing custom Wayland display servers.

db:article.db:para: Provides C++ classes for writing custom Wayland display servers.

db:listitem.db:para: The QWaylandBufferRef class holds the reference to a surface buffer.
The QWaylandClient class represents a client connecting to the QWaylandCompositor.
The QWaylandIviApplication class is an extension for embedded-style user interfaces.
The QWaylandQuickShellSurfaceItem class provides a Qt Quick item that represents a QWaylandShellSurface.
The QWaylandSeat class provides access to keyboard, mouse, and touch input.
The QWaylandShellSurface class is a common interface for surface roles specified by shell extensions.
The QWaylandSurface class represents a rectangular area on an output device.
The QWaylandSurfaceGrabber class allows to read the content of a QWaylandSurface.
The QWaylandTouch class provides access to a touch device.
The QWaylandXdgPopupV6 class represents the popup specific parts of an xdg surface.
The QWaylandXdgShellV6 class is an extension for desktop-style user interfaces.
The QWaylandXdgSurfaceV6 class provides desktop-style compositor-specific features to an xdg surface.
The QWaylandXdgToplevelV6 class represents the toplevel window specific parts of an xdg surface.
